title: Markovian Mirage
description: Terrorists transform one of Dr. Jim Greyson's discoveries into the ultimate doomsday weapon. Now the U.S. government needs Jim's help to thwart the terrorists and save planet Earth. Markovian Mirage is a tight, fast-paced science fiction action thriller set in Washington DC, New York, New Jersey, California's Silicon Valley, and a mysterious desert hideout.
author: Richard Kahlshier
